<div id="sc_container">
    <div id="showcase" class="showcase">

<script type="text/javascript" src="https://secure.isi.org/scripts_v2/swfobject.js"></script>
<script id="ShowcaseItem" type="text/x-jsrender">
    <div class="showcase-slide">
        <div class="showcase-content">
            <img src="{{:imgPath}}" alt="" />
        </div>
        <div class="showcase-caption {{:blurbPos}}" 
             style="width:{{:~infobox.width - (~infobox.padding * 2 )}}px;
                    padding:{{:~infobox.padding}}px;
                    background-color:#{{:~infobox.color}};
                    opacity:.{{:~infobox.alpha}};
                    border-radius:{{:~infobox.round}}px">
            <div class="title" 
                 style="font-size:{{:~textOpts.titleSize}}px;
                        color:#{{:~textOpts.titleColor}};">{{:title}}</div>
            <div class="blurb" style="padding:{{:~infobox.vspacer}}px 0;">{{:blurb}}</div>
            <a class="ISI_action_btn" href="{{:button.url}}">{{:button.label}}</a>
        </div>
        <div class="showcase-thumbnail">
                <img src="{{:imgPath}}" alt="{#index}" width="{{:~controls.width * 1.5 }}px" />
        </div>
    </div>
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    document.domain = 'isi.org';

    var flashvars = {};
    flashvars.scControlXML = "//home.isi.org/document.doc?id=1567";
    flashvars.scTitle = "The Intercollegiate Studies Institute - Educating for Liberty";
    var params = {};
    params.wmode = "transparent";    
    params.scale = "noscale";
    params.salign = "tl";
    params.menu = "false";
    
    var attributes = {};
    attributes.id = "showcase";
    params.allowscriptaccess = "always";

    function callback(e){
        if( !e.success ){
            (function( $ ){
                $.getScript('//home.isi.org/document.doc?id=1565',function(){
                    $.ajax({
                        url:'//home.isi.org/document.doc?id=1567',
                        handleAs:'xml',
                        success:function(data){
                            var opts = {
                                swfPath:$(data).find('showcase').attr('dir') + '/' + $(data).find('showcase').attr('filename'),
                                dataDocPath:$(data).find('data').attr('dir') + '/' + $(data).find('data').attr('filename'),
                                backgroundColor:$(data).find('background').attr('color').slice(2)
                            };
                            var x = $(data).find('frame');
                            opts.frame = {
                                color:x.attr('color').slice(2),
                                width:x.attr('width'),
                                edgeColor:x.attr('edgeColor').slice(2),
                                edgeWidth:x.attr('edgeWidth'),
                                round:x.attr('round'),
                                margin:x.attr('margin')
                            };
                            x = $(data).find('horizon');
                            opts.horizon = {
                                color:x.attr('color').slice(2),
                                height:x.attr('height')
                            };
                            x = $(data).find('controls');
                            opts.controls = {
                                width:x.attr('width'),
                                height:x.attr('height'),
                                boost:x.attr('boost'),
                                btnSpacing:x.attr('btnSpacing'),
                                padding:x.attr('padding'),
                                sharpness:x.attr('sharpness'),
                                mode:x.attr('mode'),
                                bgColor:x.attr('bgColor').slice(2)
                            };
                            x = $(data).find('timers');
                            opts.timers = {
                                loop:x.attr('loop'),
                                interact:x.attr('interact'),
                                auto:x.attr('auto'),
                                reportfreq:x.attr('reportfreq')
                            }
                            x = $(data).find('infobox');
                            opts.infobox = {
                                width:x.attr('width'),
                                padding:x.attr('padding'),
                                vspacer:x.attr('vspacer'),
                                color:x.attr('color').slice(2),
                                alpha:x.attr('alpha'),
                                round:x.attr('round')
                            };
                            x = $(data).find('text');
                            opts.textOpts = {
                                titleSize:x.attr('titleSize'),
                                titleColor:x.attr('titleColor').slice(2),
                                titleBold:(x.attr('titleBold')==1),
                                defaultSize:x.attr('defaultSize'),
                                defaultColor:x.attr('defaultColor').slice(2),
                                defaultBold:(x.attr('defaultBold')==1)
                            };
                            $.ajax({
                                url:opts.dataDocPath,
                                dataType:'xml',
                                success:function(data){
                                    $('#showcase').empty();
                                    var items = [];
                                    $(data).find('item').each(function(i){
                                        var item = {
                                            imgPath: $(this).find('image').attr('dir') + '/' + $(this).find('image').attr('filename'),
                                            blurbPos: $(this).find('info').attr('position'),
                                            title:$.trim( $(this).find('title').text()),
                                            blurb:$.trim( $(this).find('blurb').text()),
                                            button:{
                                                label:$(this).find('button').attr('text'),
                                                url:$(this).find('button').attr('url')
                                            }
                                        }
                                        items.push( item );
                                    });
                                    $('#showcase').html( $('#ShowcaseItem').render( items, opts ) );
                                    $('#showcase').awShowcase(
                                    {
                                        content_width:		960,
                                        content_height:		400,
                                        fit_to_parent:		false,
                                        auto:			true,
                                        interval:		opts.timers.auto,
                                        continuous:		true,
                                        loading:		true,
                                        tooltip_width:		200,
                                        tooltip_icon_width:	32,
                                        tooltip_icon_height:	32,
                                        tooltip_offsetx:	18,
                                        tooltip_offsety:	0,
                                        arrows:			false,
                                        buttons:		false,
                                        btn_numbers:		false,
                                        keybord_keys:		true,
                                        mousetrace:		false, /* Trace x and y coordinates for the mouse */
                                        pauseonover:		true,
                                        stoponclick:		true,
                                        transition:		'hslide', /* hslide/vslide/fade */
                                        transition_delay:	0,
                                        transition_speed:	opts.timers.loop,
                                        show_caption:		'onload', /* onload/onhover/show */
                                        thumbnails:		true,
                                        thumbnails_position:	'outside-last', /* outside-last/outside-first/inside-last/inside-first */
                                        thumbnails_direction:	'horizontal', /* vertical/horizontal */
                                        thumbnails_slidex:	1, /* 0 = auto / 1 = slide one thumbnail / 2 = slide two thumbnails / etc. */
                                        dynamic_height:		false, /* For dynamic height to work in webkit you need to set the width and height of images in the source. Usually works to only set the dimension of the first slide in the showcase. */
                                        speed_change:		true, /* Set to true to prevent users from swithing more then one slide at once. */
                                        viewline:		false, /* If set to true content_width, thumbnails, transition and dynamic_height will be disabled. As for dynamic height you need to set the width and height of images in the source. */
                                        custom_function:	null /* Define a custom function that runs on content change */
                                    });
                                }
                            });
                            
                        }
                    })
                    
                    
                });
            })( jQuery );
        }
    }
    
    swfobject.embedSWF("//home.isi.org/document.doc?id=1568", "showcase", "100%", "100%", "9.0.0", false, flashvars, params, attributes, callback);
</script>

</div>
</div>
</div>
